oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: A. Roy Lavik correspondence with Raymond B. Witt, 1969 March 17
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lavik, A. Roy
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Office memorandum from attorney A. Roy Lavik to Raymond B. Witt reviewing recent court decisions regarding the affirmative responsibility of school boards in dismantling segregation.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mapp v. Board of Education of Chattanooga; Segregation in education -- Law and legislation
Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education; United States. District Court (Tennessee: Eastern Division)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Mapp v. Board of Education correspondence, 1968-1969
Chattanooga Board of Education records and correspondence, 1965-1969
